alert.note: Alert for Harding (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 30 at 5:08PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Harding County through 545 PM MDT... At 508 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 3 miles northeast of Ludlow, or 21 miles northeast of Buffalo. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ludlow. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
